metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6039 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in lan78xx_disconnect in drivers/net/usb/lan78xx.c in the network sub-component, net/usb/lan78xx in the Linux Kernel. This flaw allows a local attacker to crash the system when the LAN78XX USB device detaches.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> issue observed when device is disconnected or driver unloaded.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
